snippet.title: Steamfarer - RPG about steampunk airships - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Steamfarer is an RPG about steampunk airships. Take on a role of a captain of an air vessel, explore the world, equip your ship, gather and level up your crew.
The game is (though renamed and with big changes) available on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/708950/Steam_Tactics/
More info at steamtactics.com
https://www.facebook.com/steamfarer
